results.name: Matrix log of triangle A111825, which shifts columns left and up under matrix 6th power; these terms are the result of multiplying each element in row n and column k by (n-k)!.
comment: Column k equals 6^k multiplied by column 0 (A111829) when ignoring zeros above the diagonal.
